page.title: 14OUR VILLAGE SHOPS
page.content:
Interview.Mr.Massey.Newsagents. ========= == ====== =========== We interviewed Graham Massey whose father owns the shop. "We've had the shop for{seventeen {years,"}he said." This shop has not changed alot.We've taken on the newsagents but everything else is basically the same." "The main line that people buy are {Newspapers and groceries."
Interview.Mr.Morton.Postmaster. ========= == ====== ======== We asked him how long he'd lived in Grindleford he said "All my life,{40 {years."}He said that the post office was built in{1929-1930,}before that it was built across at what is now the butchers.Mr.Morton also sells{sweets, {toys & gifts. }
